name: YummyBugs
author: pdodd
description:
Do you have a lot of small insects and find yourself wishing you had something worse to craft with them than fishing bait? Your dreams can now come true!

[b]YummyBugs allows adds a new craftable item to you main menu: yummy bugs![/b] 

After crafting some from small insects, you are then able to [b]use them from your hotbar[/b] as food, restoring a (very) small amount of energy.
